Game works fine. As is the case with every hentai game, you need to run it using Japanese AppLocale and most likely as an administrator also.

Only downside is that this part probably won't have an English patch for awhile being that the game contains much more dialogue compared to the previous two: http://roguetranslations.wordpress.com/
